com.epimorphics.lda.renderers
Class Factories

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.Factories

public class Factories
extends Object

Named renderer factories. (A renderer factory is just a way to make a renderer.) A Factories object can retrieve renderers by their name or their media type.
